title: Unfinished Handkerchief, early 20th century
medium: Technique: Loosely woven plain weave printed in light blue.  Machine woven tape laid on top of the pattern as a foundation for needlework. Needle fillings started in two areas.
creditline: Gift of The Cleveland Museum of Art
description: Pattern of flowers falling into the center of the handkerchief.

tombstone.epitaph:
Unfinished Handkerchief, early 20th century.
early 20th century. Technique: Loosely woven plain weave printed in light blue.  Machine woven tape laid on top of the pattern as a foundation for needlework. Needle fillings started in two areas.. Gift of The Cleveland Museum of Art. 1983-63-7.
